com.courseApp.userService

Class UserRequestProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.courseApp.userService.UserRequestProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UseLoginRegister, UseQueryUserData, UseUpdateUserData

    public class UserRequestProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements UseQueryUserData, UseLoginRegister, UseUpdateUserData
    User request processor use case, which implements query user data, user login/register and update data functions.
